text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Did it even occur to you that this many medical supplies would have not been needed, if your beloved leader had acted sooner and not downplayed and took the Covid19 a bit more serious, when he first learned about it in early January?  https://t.co/4Yr9u8CCaf
